title: Confusion, but not panic, reigns in global finance in Russia's wake - Economic Times

description: The shock is being felt in unexpected places. In Germany, the debt office has had to increase the size of a bond to ease conditions in euro zone overnight lending markets, a crucial source of credit for banks and other financial institutions.
